def suggest_random_book(library):
    """
    Pick a random book using the standard library 'random'.

    if not library:
        return None
    bid = random.choice(list(library.keys()))
    return bid, library[bid]

def magic(num_list):
    num_arr = np.array(num_list)
    dot_product = np.dot(num_arr, num_arr)
    max_value = np.max(num_arr)
    return dot_product * max_value

def random_book(library):
    if not library:
        print("Library is empty!")
        return None
    keys_list = list(library.keys())
    random_index = random.randint(0, len(keys_list) - 1)
    random_id = keys_list[random_index]
    random_book = library[random_id]
    print(f"I think You can read this: '{random_book[0]}' from {random_book[1]} ({random_book[2]})")
    return random_book
